remarks:
If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` and ` ps ` , it is not free in ` ( ph \/ ps ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.) 

---

 If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` and ` ps ` , it is not free in ` ( ph \/ ps ) ` .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 11-Mar-2018.)
statement:
nf.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
nf.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
nfor $p |- F/ x ( ph \/ ps ) $.
